name: npmplus
description: NPMplus is an enhanced fork of Nginx Proxy Manager offering additional plugins, UI improvements, and community integrations for easier reverse proxy and SSL management in self-hosted setups.
features: Enhanced proxy manager: Fork of Nginx Proxy Manager with additional features and improvements.
SSL management: Automatic certificate generation and renewal with Let's Encrypt and custom CAs.
Advanced routing: Configure complex proxy rules with custom headers and rewrites.
Plugin support: Extend functionality with community plugins and integrations.
Improved UI: Enhanced interface with better usability and additional configuration options.
Access control: Protect services with IP whitelisting, basic auth, or custom authentication.
WebSocket proxying: Full support for WebSocket connections and real-time applications.
Custom Nginx configs: Add advanced directives and configurations for specialized needs.
Monitoring dashboard: View proxy statistics, traffic, and health status.
Backup and restore: Export and import configurations for disaster recovery.
Docker optimized: Designed for containerized deployments with minimal resource usage.
Community-driven: Active development with features requested by the self-hosting community.
